headline: Devon Outperforms Industry Year to Date: How to Play the Stock?
summary: DVN benefits from its multi-basin assets and high-margin oil and gas assets. Earnings estimates for DVN are going down, so new investors should wait for a better entry point.

headline: Occidental Petroleum (NYSE:OXY) Explores South Texas DAC Facility With US$500 Million Potential Investment
summary: Occidental Petroleum (NYSE:OXY) recently announced a joint venture with ADNOC's XRG to develop a Direct Air Capture facility in South Texas, aligning with broader market enthusiasm, as seen with a 14% S&P 500 rise in seven days. The collaboration, potentially involving a $500 million investment, coincided with Occidental's 15% share price increase over the last month. The company's Q1 2025 earnings report, highlighting revenue growth to $6.8 billion, also played a role in supporting positive...

headline: Occidental and ADNOC’s XRG Agree to Evaluate Joint Venture to Develop South Texas Direct Air Capture Hub
summary: XRG to consider investing up to $500 million for the development of 1PointFive’s 500,000 tonne-capacity DAC facilityHOUSTON, May 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Occidental (NYSE: OXY) and its subsidiary 1PointFive today announced an agreement with XRG, ADNOC’s investment company, to evaluate a potential joint venture to develop a Direct Air Capture (DAC) facility in South Texas. As part of the joint venture, XRG will consider investing up to $500 million for the development of a DAC facility design

As part of the joint venture, XRG will consider investing up to $500 million for the development of a DAC facility design
